unnormalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill this month was ₹3500! Last month it was only ₹2800. Maybe I should check my AC consumption; it's on for like, 10 hrs a day.
normalised: Are yaar, my electricity bill this month was rupee three thousand five hundred! Last month it was only rupee two thousand eight hundred. Maybe I should check my A-C consumption; it's on for like, ten hours a day.
